= Class *jplex.components.Overlay*  _extends [APIPangolincommonComponent jplex.common.Component]_  =

== Description ==
Overlay component.
Place a semi-transparent layer which covers its parent on the page.
It's mainly used by the Frame components.

== Config Table ==
|| *Name* || *Default Value* || *Description* ||
|| _color_ || `"#000000" (black)` ||  Color of the overlay ||
|| _fade_ || `false` ||  If `true` the overlay will be shown/hidden using fade in/out ||
|| _opacity_ || `0.75` ||  Opacity of the overlay ||
|| _z_ || `1` ||  z-index for the overlay ||

== Event Table ==
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Parameters* ||
|| _afterRenderElement_ ||  Fired after the rendering of the overlay ||  ||
|| _beforeRenderEvent_ ||  Fired before the rendering of the overlay ||  ||
|| _onHideEvent_ ||  Fired after the overlay is hidden ||  ||
|| _onShowEvent_ ||  Fired after the overlay is shown ||  ||


== Methods ==                                
|| *Signature* || *Return Type* || *Description* ||
|| `hide()` || `void` || Hide the overlay<br /> ||
|| `render()` || `void` || Renders the overlay<br /> ||
|| `show()` || `void` || Show the overlay<br /> ||
